fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Hong Kong: £357 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow. Must be booked by February 22. Full payment required when booking. Valid for departures April 10-June 17. Minimum stay three nights, maximum one month. Airline Network (0870 2349915, airlinenetwork.co.uk). Sydney: £499 Gulf Airways from Heathrow via Bahrain and Singapore. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures February 1-June 30. No minimum stay, maximum six months. All travel must be completed by December 15. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). · NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush New York: £236 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures until March 16. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one year. ebookers (0870 8146024, ebookers.com). Los Angeles: £279 Virgin Atlantic from Heathrow. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures until February 28, then April 1-30. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Amsterdam: £58.20 BMI from Heathrow. Must be booked online. Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI (0870 6070555, flybmi.com). Paris: £84.90 British Airways from Birmingham. Must be booked online (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. British Airways (0870 8509850, ba.com). The pick of the rest Bilbao: £76 Monarch Airlines charter from Gatwick. Departs March 24 for four nights. Avro (0870 4582847, avro.co.uk). Cape Town: £378 Qatar Airways from Gatwick via Doha. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay six days, maximum two months. Bridge the World (0870 8146318, bridgetheworld.com). Buenos Aires: £510 Alitalia from Heathrow, Manchester or Birmingham via Rome. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Journey Latin America (020-8747 3108, journeylatinamerica.co.uk). Mumbai: £345 Qatar Airways from Heathrow or Gatwick via Doha. Valid for departures until March 18. Minimum stay three days, maximum two months. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). And the rail alternative Paris, Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same-day returns or trips including a Saturday-night stay. Eurostar 08705 186186, eurostar.com). · NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush
